document.stem:
The Management card in the Advanced View displays whether remote assistance is enabled or not.
If remote assistance is enabled the following information is also displayed:PortUsernamePassword
The password will only be shown if you choose, to use a random password.
document.p: To open the Management page, click the Management card in the Advanced View .
The Management page contains the following tabs:
document.li1: The User Manager tab allows you to:

The Remote Assistance tab allows you to enable remote assistance.
Remote assistance allows you to grant access to your from the Internet.
